|stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-G19 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/14/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = 00:1E:58,00:21:91 |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Alpha Networks WRG-G19 (8WRGG19..1C1G) The [[Airlink101 AR430W]], [[Airlink101 AR335W]], and [[D-Link WBR-1310 rev A1]] are also WRG-G19s. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/DIR300 DIR-300 rev A on the DD-WRT wiki]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-300 DIR-300 on the OpenWrt wiki] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/yohanes/4488923533/lightbox/ Board shot] [https://picasaweb.google.com/etthtech/DLinkDIR300A1RU Pictures], showing a IP175C switch instead of the IP175E ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v24rc5 :clone of [[Airlink101 AR335W|AR335W]] :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/D-Link_DIR-300_rev_A Install Guide] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dir-300_a1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-300 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 10.03.1 |current_supported_version = 10.03.1 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
